title: Amazing
text: The Acropolis was an amazing place to visit. So much history. The view the atmosphere, its a must do in Greece.

title: In more or my surrounding
text: It was an amazing place to visit. I was in ore of my surroundings. The staff were friendly and knowledgeable.

title: Not what I expected
text:
Unfortunately we had just travelled from Brisbane Southbank Novotel which was amazing so I had high expectations that where not met.
For the price the room was ok however, I ripped bed sheets and a pillow cover that had mold stains. It had been washed but stained, should have been disposed of for health reasons.
The bed was not comfortable at all.
Also we where given a parking ticket for out stay and assumed it was included as we were not advised otherwise... it wasn't. Upon sign out I reported this and was advised it would be investigated and before payment went through, however was sent a bill with not follow up.
